Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CXCL20b (cytokine ligand 20b, CXC family, kinocidin, natural AMPs; Fish, animals)

Literature.Author: Xiao X, Zhang Y, Liao Z, Su J. 2020
Literature.Title: Characterization and Antimicrobial Activity of the Teleost Chemokine CXCL20b

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (30.6%) tohuman CXCL1.Activity:  Potent antimicrobial activity against both Gram-positive S. aureus and Gram-negative bacteria E. coli. bacterial membrane depolarization and disruption (BBMm). Antimicrobial activity of CXCL20b might be largely related to its N-terminal region peptides.
